name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RealEyes.ai — Detect Deepfakes Across Online Platforms

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an overlay icon on images which allows the image to be analyzed for deepfake manipulation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RealEyes helps you navigate the increasingly complex world of digital media by providing AI-powered analysis of images across major social platforms including LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Reddit.

Key Features:
• Smart Integration: Subtle overlay icons appear on images across supported social media platforms
• Secure Analysis: Click the icon, review the privacy consent, and get detailed AI manipulation detection results
• Clear Results: Receive comprehensive feedback with probability scores and confidence indicators
• Privacy-Focused: User consent required before any image analysis

How It Works:
1. Browse your favorite social media platforms
2. Look for the RealEyes.ai icon on images
3. Review and accept the consent
4. Click to begin analysis
5. Get detailed results showing the likelihood of AI manipulation

Perfect for:
• Social media users concerned about misinformation
• Professionals verifying content authenticity
• Digital literacy advocates
• Anyone wanting to make informed decisions about online content

Privacy & Security:
• Transparent consent process
• Secure JWT-based authentication
• Optional image storage with clear user consent
• Content security policies enforced
• Cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) protection

Supported Platforms:
• LinkedIn
• Facebook
• Twitter/X
• Instagram
• Reddit

Stay informed and protect yourself from misleading content with RealEyes AI - your companion for detecting AI-generated images online.

Note: This extension requires a RealEyes account for image analysis. The signup process is quick and straightforward through our secure authentication system.
